cab.content: Operations. SEC RET.From :'- General Piumer, Italy. To :- C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched 5.21 p.m-, 17/12/17, Received. 3 aem* 18/12/17.0.130.Enemy have again made local attacks near Col Dorso but up to this afternoon had not met with any "success. Though a certain amount of snow has fallen/ as yet there is not sufficient to affect operations. Our aeroplanes have been doing very good work and have destroyed four enemy aircraft during past week.
